<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Whether we allow for extra compile-time budget to perform more</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// analysis to produce fewer false positives.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This is useful when reporting missed optimizations.  In this case we can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// use the extra analysis (1) to filter trivial false positives or (2) to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// provide more context so that non-trivial false positives can be quickly</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// detected by the user.</span></CodeLine>
